attributes.action: Stop taxes spirraling out of control, also to explain why business rates are so high and what the money is used for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxes are growing. Why are we being taxed so much? There is tax on tax. We recieve wages which is taxed and then anything that we buy is then taxed. Business rates are out of control. What are these rates used for? I have already been in touch with the Deputy PM office and even their they could not tell me what it is for. It is time that this issue is cleaned up and for the government to explain. It's hard enough to run a small business. But with all these taxes it is almost impossible. You are suppose to help and I think that we are being pushed out of our business.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
